events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision at a stoplight downtown.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident cluster after reviewing the initial report details.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage the auto accident claim and begin processing.
The customer was promptly notified with an acknowledgment of the car accident claim submission.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle and police report to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted the required photos and official police report as part of the claim process.
The investigation into the circumstances and liability of the auto accident has officially commenced.
Investigation concluded with clear findings that establish fault and validate the customerâ€™s claim.
A settlement offering compensation for vehicle repairs was proposed to the claimant pending approval.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and requested expedited processing for repairs.
The insurance claim was officially approved and authorized for disbursement of the settlement amount.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer's approved repair shop as per the settlement agreement.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after full payment and confirmation of repairs.
All records related to the claim were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
